name: Fallen London: The Century Exhibition
storyline: A magnificent Exhibition has come to London, with all the wonders of modern technology on display! But a thief is amidst the gaudy pavilions, seeking an elusive prize, and an aberrant menace from the Heavens is about to be unleashed. Dare you make an enemy of time itself?
summary: Addon for Fallen London. The Exceptional Story for February, 2017. Third and final entry in the Season of Skies.
